verses.verse: Now in the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> in order to fulfill<WH3615> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> by the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> the Lord<WH3068> stirred<WH5782> up the spirit<WH7307> of Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> so that he sent<WH5674> a proclamation<WH6963> throughout all<WH3605> his kingdom,<WH4438> and also<WH1571> [put it] in writing,<WH4385> saying,<WH559>

"Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> Cyrus<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> 'The Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of heaven,<WH8064> has given<WH5414> me all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth,<WH776> and He has appointed<WH6485> me to build<WH1129> Him a house<WH1004> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> which<WH834> is in Judah.<WH3063>

'Whoever<WH4310> there is among you of all<WH3605> His people,<WH5971> may his God<WH430> be with him! Let him go<WH5927> up to Jerusalem<WH3389> which<WH834> is in Judah,<WH3063> and rebuild<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> He is the God<WH430> who<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

'And every<WH3605> survivor,<WH7604> at whatever<WH3605> <WH834> place<WH4725> he may live,<WH1481> let the men<WH376> of that place<WH4725> support<WH5375> him with silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> with goods<WH7399> and cattle,<WH929> together<WH5973> with a freewill<WH5071> offering<WH5071> for the house<WH1004> of God<WH430> which<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>' "

Then the heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144> and the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> arose,<WH6965> even everyone<WH3605> whose spirit<WH7307> God<WH430> had stirred<WH5782> to go<WH5927> up and rebuild<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068> which<WH834> is in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

And all<WH3605> those about<WH5439> them encouraged<WH2388> <WH3027> them with articles<WH3627> of silver,<WH3701> with gold,<WH2091> with goods,<WH7399> with cattle,<WH929> and with valuables,<WH4030> aside<WH905> from all<WH3605> that was given<WH5068> as a freewill<WH5068> offering.<WH5068>

Also King<WH4428> Cyrus<WH3566> brought<WH3318> out the articles<WH3627> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> which<WH834> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had carried<WH3318> away<WH3318> from Jerusalem<WH3389> and put<WH5414> in the house<WH1004> of his gods;<WH430>

and Cyrus,<WH3566> king<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> had them brought<WH3318> out by the hand<WH3027> of Mithredath<WH4990> the treasurer,<WH1489> and he counted<WH5608> them out to Sheshbazzar,<WH8339> the prince<WH5387> of Judah.<WH3063>
Now this<WH428> [was] their number:<WH4557> 30<WH7970> gold<WH2091> dishes,<WH105> 1000 silver<WH3701> dishes,<WH105> 29<WH8672> <WH6242> duplicates;<WH4252>
30<WH7970> gold<WH2091> bowls,<WH3713> 410 silver<WH3701> bowls<WH3713> of a second<WH4932> [kind, and] 1000 other<WH312> articles.<WH3627>

All<WH3605> the articles<WH3627> of gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701> [numbered] 5400. Sheshbazzar<WH8339> brought<WH5927> them all<WH3605> up with the exiles<WH1473> who went<WH5927> up from Babylon<WH894> to Jerusalem.<WH3389>
